faq.title: We solve your doubts
faq.description: Everything you need to know about Datacivis and LISA.

items.question: Is this “just” a chatbot?
items.answer: No. Datacivis is an agent orchestration platform. LISA not only chats, but creates content, sets up ads on Facebook/Instagram, and performs real-time social listening.

items.question: How long does it take to get something running?
items.answer: Base implementation takes weeks. Being conversational, configuring your tone of voice and goals is almost instantaneous.

items.question: Do I need to know how to program or touch APIs?
items.answer: Absolutely not. All interaction with the platform is in natural language. If you know how to chat, you know how to use Datacivis.

items.question: On which channels can Datacivis operate?
items.answer: Instagram, Facebook, WhatsApp, Email, and more. Direct integration with popular CRMs coming soon.

items.question: Can a human take over the conversation?
items.answer: Yes. The system has 'Human-in-the-loop'. When the AI detects a complex query or the user requests it, it escalates to your human team.
